body.name: 32 oz Powder Coated Double Wall Vacuum Insulated Sports Water Bottle, 18/8 Stainless Steel Wide Mouth Thermos Flask with Straw Lid & Spout Lid, Leak Proof, Sweat Free, BPA Free (Pink, 32 oz)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 4 hrs 5 mins
features: INNOVATIVE VACUUM INSULATION: With double layered vacuum-insulated, Honogo 32 ounce thermo bottle provide perfect termperature control, keep beverages cold up to 24 hours, and hot up to 12 hours with fresh taste. 100% sweat free and no condensation

18/8 STAINLESS STEEL: Honogo water bottles are made of premium 18/8 of 304 stainless steel that is 100% non-toxic, BPA free and phthalete-free. It will never leave a metal taste or rust. Unlike other metal water bottles, Honogo water bottle always bring you heathy and pure taste with food grade material

STRAW LID & SPOUT LID: The Insulated water flask comes with 2 lids: a straw lid and a 100% leak-proof spout lid, both with wide handle, very convenient for you to travel outdoor adventure. Straw lid for icy cold drinks, and spout lid for hot coffee. Come with a bonus silicone boot sleeve

FOOD SAFE & BPA FREE: Drink with confidence, your BPA-free water bottle is made with non-toxic materials. With a reusable water bottle it’s easy to stay hydrated all day long. For the coldest drink, add ice cubes to your insulated bottle. Not like plastic bottle, hono bottles are much more food-safe and eco-friendly . All our effort is to bring you a healthy drink and healthy life

HIGHEST QUALITY GUARANTEED: Honogo water bottles come with a limited lifetime warranty against manufacturing defects. We provide you with 12 hours of customer care. If you have any dissatisfaction with our stainless steel water bottle, please contact us through Amazon platform for free return or refund.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: OUR STORY Honogo is more than a bottle. We practice the idea of Go green! It's not just a fashionable slogan, but also what we strongly believe in and dedicated to our world. We listen to our customers, our staff and our business partners and we are all concerned about sustainability and our environment. We are committed to build longer lasting insulated water bottle using less energy and producing less waste with more sustainable materials. We are proud to join hands with you to create a life that is worth living.

FEATURES & BENEFITS Innovation vacuum insulated With double layered vacuum-insulated, Honogo water bottle provide perfect termperature control, keep beverages cold up to 24 hours & hot up to 12 hours with fresh taste. Food safe and BPA free Double wall SUS304 stainless steel, reusable and unbreakable. Free of Bisphenol A, zero toxin. 100% food safe materials, to keep you safe hydrated all day. Two lids for easy drink Straw lid ideal for icy cold drinks; Chug lid, ideal for cold drink & hot coffee. Thick silicone gasket can prevent 100% leak. The universal lids also compatible with Hydroflask, Iron flask, Takeya etc.

Wide mouth design Wide mouth of diameter 2.25 inch, makes refilling and cleaning much easier. Perfect for big sized ice cubes. Meanwhile, it's an easier and safer way to fill with hot coffee, tea or soup. A simple design, bring you modern life. Durable powder coated The durable powder coating is resistant to scratching, peeling or fading. Easy to grip, slip-free, no sweat. Making it very suitable for outdoor activity, gym, yoga, camping, hiking, travel, beach. Enjoy your favorite drinks. Bonus accessories gift Each honogo water bottle comes with 2 lids, and 2 straws, 1 straw brush and 1 bonus silicone boot. The protective silicone sleeve provides extra protection for bottle bottom, to make your bottle long-lasting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful bottle. It really hold cold for the entire day. Friends love the look and feel. The silicone cover for the bottle is a plus. Only disadvantage is the straws are a bit short but I just exchange them with another bottle I had. Overall it's a great buy for the price. Ordering another one for my daughter soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent drink bottle.
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent drink bottle for cold and hot liquids. I was looking for a water bottle that had a large enough opening to fill with ice water as most water bottles you cant fill with ice. Surprisingly filled with ice will last approx 18 hours if not in direct sun. Love the color. East to fill and clean with supplied brushes if you use the supplied straws. At this price, should of bought a second one as I use it very often.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My girls love these very durable
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these for my girls for the 2023 school year. They love them they love all the accessories and these water bottles do not leak. Would definitely buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Water Bottle
reviews.reviewText: Color is nice and bright and keeps things cold for a very long time. My husband loves it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love this thermos (got two!) but not great at keeping warm for long time
reviews.reviewText: I had a different thermos that I really disliked. This thermos is fabulous. It comes with two different caps -- one is for pouring and the other is for drinking. It comes with two long straws as well as a little brush to clean the drinking apparatus and the straws. Definitely GREAT for the money. The only reason it gets 4 stars is that it doesn't keep things as warm for as long as it touts it does. I'd say the contents (which are usually tea or coffee) stay warm for about 3 - 4 hours (and I do preheat the thermos first) and after that it's lukewarm. I don't know about how long things stay cold because I don't use it for cold beverages. Would I buy it again? Yes. I've been looking for a good thermos for a long time (and need the wider mouth to mix everything up) and this one really does fit the bill.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars keeps cold COLD
reviews.reviewText: does a great job of keeping my water cold

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not packaged in a sanitized fashion.
reviews.reviewText: The product most likely works just find however, the straws are just loose in the box and are not packaged in any sanitary way which gives me pause in this current environment. The color while somewhat orange has that pinkish hue, I was hoping for that burnt or blaze orange so both of these will be returned.
Está increíble, mi hija lo ama.
